oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Using a survey research design with a convenience sample, the investigators will evaluate discharge teaching in the Pediatric Cardiology Unit at the Stollery Children's Hospital. The survey tool will provide anonymous data from parents related to their children's hospitalization and discharge from hospital.
